mapper.sql: ID, NAME, PRICE, SELLER_ID, SEX, BRAND, COLOR, NUM, DESCRIBE, SIZE
mapper.insert: insert into TREASURE (ID, NAME, PRICE, SELLER_ID, SEX, BRAND, COLOR, NUM, DESCRIBE, SIZE ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{sellerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update TREASURE
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=FLOAT},
SELLER_ID = #{sellerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRAND = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COLOR = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NUM = #{num,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DESCRIBE = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIZE = #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
